item.description: There are rumors of a secluded village where the walking dead roam freely, keeping their minds and natures intact in spite of their bodies having died. The rumors are proven suddenly one night when a desperate plea for help comes from the village of Sanctuary where the undead dwell in peace. What could there possibly be that has the dead afraid? Take on the role of a fantasy hero in this 2 hour foam sword adventure and help solve the mystery! Intended for ages 10+.
item.name: Adventure Night: Sanctuary
